Step 1: Your Society's Foundation

ü§ù Equality

All people have equal opportunities and treatment

üïäÔ∏è Freedom

üèòÔ∏è Community

Collective wellbeing and mutual support

üå± Sustainability

Environmental protection for future generations

üè∫ Tradition

Respect for cultural heritage and wisdom

üöÄ Innovation

Progress through new ideas and technology

Step 2: How Will Your Society Be Governed?

üó≥Ô∏è Democracy

Citizens vote on leaders and major decisions

üèõÔ∏è Council of Elders

Wise experienced leaders make decisions together

üí¨ Consensus

Everyone must agree before decisions are made

ü§ù Federation

Different communities govern themselves but cooperate

Step 4: Economic System

üí∞ Market Economy

People earn through work and trade freely

ü§≤ Sharing Economy

Resources are shared based on need

üèóÔ∏è Contribution-Based
